name: Lamu
more_info: Lamu is a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its well-preserved Swahili architecture.

name: Watamu
more_info: Watamu is famous for its marine parks and beautiful coral reefs.

name: Amboseli
more_info: Amboseli is renowned for its large elephant herds and views of Mount Kilimanjaro.

name: Mombasa
more_info: Mombasa offers a variety of beaches and rich cultural heritage.

name: Diani
more_info: Diani is known for its pristine white sand beaches and vibrant nightlife.

name: Mara
more_info: Maasai Mara is famous for its annual wildebeest migration and diverse wildlife.
